displaytitle: Soldier kneeling over a dying companion, from the Battle of Constantine and Maxentius Fresco, Sala del Costantino in the Vatican
medium: Pen, brown ink and brown wash over traces of black chalk on tan prepared paper
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.

titles.title: Soldier kneeling over a dying companion, from the Battle of Constantine and Maxentius Fresco, Sala del Costantino in the Vatican

caption: After Giulio Romano (Italian, 1499–1546), Soldier kneeling over a dying companion, from the Battle of Constantine and Maxentius Fresco, Sala del Costantino in the Vatican. Pen, brown ink and brown wash over traces of black chalk on tan prepared paper; 21.8 x 25.5 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1951-46)
